title: How does one start thinking towards inventing stuff or registering patents? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have innovative ideas, you can easily improve existing product or system You can list all possible improvement s and initiate a prototype If there are few inventive steps which are non obvious, you can patent If patented, it is like a property, you can rent or give license to someone to do if you can't do it yourself

Identify the technology domain.Research on topic of interest.Analysis of the existing knowledge/problems/prior arts.Focus on curating existing problems/increase efficiency etc.File provisional patent application and then complete applicaiton with in a year.
